byline.original: By SUSAN SAULNY and SARAH WHEATON

abstract: Herman Cain clarifies his remarks on a deadly border fence and acknowledges his tax plan would result in higher taxes for some.
snippet: Herman Cain clarifies his remarks on a deadly border fence and acknowledges his tax plan would result in higher taxes for some.

headline.main: Cain Says His Deadly Fence Plan Was 'a Joke'
